author: Lupin 7
subject: Lupin the Third Street
body:
Hey all, thought I'd email you all and tell you I opened my website, Lupin 
the Third Street, http://lupin.sansei.st/

It took near for ever to make so I hope you enjoy it. Whats on it? Hrmmm, 
thats a tuff question. Well, general lists of Movies, Manga, Games, and 
Music; as well as pictures of damn near every thing I could lay my hands on, 
including my collection, about 35 or so pieces of Manga, and even a few 
screenshots from the 'One Dollar Money Wars'. There is also a tale of Lupin 
proportions. And when my busy brother gets around to it the site will be in 
Japanese.

I also added a preview of the Store I keep mentioning; we have lots of 
stuff, mostly just manga, toys, and dolls though (even a Lupin drinking 
glass). But not everything is listed, including the gotcha gotcha figures. 
When I open it it will most likely be just in stock items for sale, as our 
special order idea is proving very difficult to manage.

Oh, and the links section has over 100 links. Hrmmm...

Well, you'll just have to see it.

The email addy on the site is the one you should use to email me, in case 
you wanted to as I will eventually be getting rid of this one; and when I do 
I don't believe I'll sign back on to this list. I don't know who David 
Hayter is, nor do I care about Lupin on DVD (sorry, I'm sure it's a great 
achievment).

Sincerely,

David Cummings
http://lupin.sansei.st
